states.name: river
states.text: You are now in the river. But there is nothing to do here.
states.prompt: What about going to the beach?

states.name: beach
states.text: You are now in the beach!. Congratulations!

states.name: wait
states.text: You waited a bit. But now you can only go to somewhere.

states.name: home
states.prompt: Would you like to go to the river or to the beach?
